titleStmt.title: The gale of opportunity. Or, A sermon preached (at Lidbury-North) at the funerall of the worshipfull Humphrey Walcot, of Walcot, Esq. June 8, 1650 and now published, by Thomas Froysell, Minister of the Gospell at Clunne in Shropshire.
titleStmt.author: Froysell, Thomas, d. ca. 1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.S. and are to be sold by H.B. ...,
